content: hi this pattern is free on the blog through the link here on ravelry i also offer an ad-free printable version for purchase through etsy here 1 cheerful vintage style granny squares adorn this oversized bag that is sure to fit your spring and summer hauls this tote adds the prettiest touch of boho style to any outfit completely customizable you can pick your favorite four colors and go made with mercerized cotton it s sturdy and washable making it perfect to take to the pool or farmers markets and because it s made up of squares this is the ideal portable project have fun skill level easy to intermediate as soon as you know how to make a basic granny square this pattern will be a breeze 2 lion brand yarn 24/7 cotton worsted #4 in white 100 g/skein 1 lion brand yarn 24/7 cotton worsted #4 in camel 100g/skein 1 lion brand yarn 24/7 cotton worsted #4 in dragonfly 100g/skein 1 lion brand yarn 24/7 cotton worsted #4 in silver 100 g/skein pattern uses approximately 310 grams of yarn total us size g 4 25 mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle size approximate 20 inches wide x 16 long i hope you enjoy it 1 https //www etsy com/listing/1189239355/magnolia-tote-bag-crochet-pattern-granny
